content: now you can crochet this cute sloth named sigmund he s crocheted with the lovely baby snuggle solid which is extremely soft and available in the cutest colors you can make sigmund the sloth in just the color you think would suit him best sigmund measures around 45 cm 17 7 in i height so he won t be overlooked have fun **skill level ** beginner **crochet hook ** 5 mm and 3 5 mm us sizes h and e **approx size ** 45 x 21 cm 17 5 x 8 5 inches **materials ** pins stuffing needle safety eyes 14 mm stitch marker **yarn ** baby snuggle solid koala #10 or teddy bear #08 - 2 skeins cream #02 - 1 skein **yarn ** rainbow cotton 8/4 black #009 - 1 skein **yarn ** rainbow cotton 8/8 pink #045 - 1 skein light brown #006 - 1 skein vanilla #052 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** **chain** - chain stitch **single_crochet** - single_crochet **1 increase** - work 2 sts in same st **1 decrease** - work 2 sts together **slip_stitch** - slip_stitch
